posts.post_content:
Morning Folks,

Anyone out there have any T206 Gibsons they'd consider trading or selling?  I am looking for any back other than Brown Hindu or EPDG.  Can trade or pay...not looking for anything high grade and though I'd prefer graded over raw, I'll consider anything.

Post here, PM or email me (richard@richardarmstrong.ca).  Whatever works best for you ;)

Regards,

Richard.

Been a good month -- managed to land a P150, both SC150s & 350s, a double name and a wet sheet transfer.

Now all I need are the OM and P350 backs.

Anyone?  Just looking to buy now.


Richard.
